# IndividualAddress.IsValidAddressTriple method

Checks if values for area, line and device are in the allowed ranges

```csharp

```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| area | The area (0-15) |
| line | The line (0-15) |
| device | The device (0-255) |
